body.content:
-- 
Dear Beloved,

 How are you and your family?

  Please I would like to know how far you have gone with my account
officer Mrs Sibel Arin regarding the transfer of my fund to you, Am
still on treatment and I don't always visit my email,  Always put me
in your prayers, and don't forget to help the poor and the motherless.
I have no doubt that you will make a good use of this fund because my
God has never failed me and i belief you remain the right person for
this job, I trust you very well please show me the same trust, all I
need from you is to eschew personal interest and make sure this fund
is fully utilized for the interest of the poor,



Here is her new email: mrs.sibelarin@accountant.com  She losted her old one.



Thanks

Faithfully,

Rev Sis Simge Pina
